item.title: By: Mary Ann Reilly
item.dc:creator: Mary Ann Reilly
item.description: Thanks so much. I look forward to learning more about the 20 school virtual worlds project. Seems like an initiative I would be interested in. I am beginning a small publication, The Little Book of Rhizomes: Travels in Complexity (or something like that). Will let you know when I publish the work:)
item.content:encoded: Thanks so much. I look forward to learning more about the 20 school virtual worlds project. Seems like an initiative I would be interested in. I am beginning a small publication, The Little Book of Rhizomes: Travels in Complexity (or something like that). Will let you know when I publish the work:)
